sentences.en: Even today I get nervous before I go onstage.
sentences.cn: 直到今天我上舞台前还是会感到紧张。

sentences.en: Gar's new sense of pride onstage derives from a deeper understanding of music and a renewed - consciousness .
sentences.cn: 嘎调重新站在舞台上的骄傲,源自于对音乐更深的理解和对 自我 更透彻的参省.

sentences.en: Her first appearance onstage brought the house down.
sentences.cn: 她首次登台就博得全场喝彩.

sentences.en: I'm going to go onstage and sing for everybody!

sentences.cn: 接下来,乐队指挥走上台前.

sentences.en: Onstage, the musicians are actually sitting behind the loudspeakers.
sentences.cn: 舞台演出时，乐师实际上坐在扬声器后面演奏。

sentences.en: The onstage ballerinas are seemingly of the uniform height.
sentences.cn: 台上演出的芭蕾舞演员似乎都一样高.

sentences.en: The soprano is singing an aria onstage.
sentences.cn: 女高音歌唱家正在舞台上演唱咏叹调.

sentences.en: They were persuaded onstage for a laugh by their mates.
sentences.cn: 他们被同伴们说服，上台一乐。

sentences.en: This time, the models performing onstage have gained a generous reward.
sentences.cn: 这次走台模特得到了丰厚的回报.

sentences.en: Training for the way to walk and stand onstage is indispensable for being a qualified model.
sentences.cn: 要想成位一名合格的模特,走台的训练是必不可少的.

sentences.en: We were standing onstage playing completely out of time.
sentences.cn: 我们站在舞台上，演奏得完全不合节拍。

sentences.en: When she walked onstage she was given a standing ovation.
sentences.cn: 当她走上台时，观众起立鼓掌欢迎。

sentences.en: You didn't get enough when I was onstage?
sentences.cn: 我在舞台上的时候你还没看够 吗 ?

sentences.en: You have to be onstage at eight o'clock.
You've got to pull yourself together before you go onstage.
sentences.cn: 上台之前,你要使自己镇静下来.

trans.tran_en: on the stage in a theatre
